page.title: 20HOUSES IN DIPTFORD
page.content: The slate quarries of Diptford provided the local people with a means of building their houses. Many houses are built of{slate}and reflect the character of the area. Modern building materials have meant the introduction of new ideas and styles. The most popular being the{bungalow.}Planning restrictions have also determined the style and materials used. Modern bungalows have interiors of a opened planned nature and because we have no gas in Diptford are{heated}by electricity or log burning stoves. Gardens are spacious and dotted with trees. The garage is a feature is of this day and age and is often built for two cars. The farm houses still dot the landscape and nestle in the valleys.
